thread.title: Six Questions to Ask a Financial Adviser About Fees

author: Michael A. Pollock
title: Six Questions to Ask a Financial Adviser About Fees
text:
Most people need financial advice at some point. But before making a deal with a financial adviser, people should know precisely what they’re paying—and what they’re paying for.
Unfortunately, that isn’t always easy. Advisers offer a range of services and fee structures, and a lot of clients can feel intimidated by both the jargon and the concepts. But if people don’t get the relationship with an adviser right at the beginning, the mistake could be compounded over years—and that can end up costing them hundreds of thousands...
